S06bsu023_u:7: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /
S06bsu023_u:8: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
S06bsu023_u:20: asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati, evaṃ yāvat asati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:21: sati tu bīje aṅkurasya abhinirvṛttirbhavati, evaṃ yāvat sati ca puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S06bsu023_u:22: tatra ca punarbījasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:24: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:25: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:26: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:27: atha bīje sati ca kāraṇabhūte aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu023_u:28: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:29: evaṃ ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
S06bsu023_u:31: punaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu023_u:46: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya dhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /
S06bsu023_u:47: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /
S06bsu023_u:48: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:49: atha punaḥ satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S06bsu023_u:50: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaśca /
S06bsu023_u:55: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
S06bsu023_u:56: kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadbījam, na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
S06bsu023_u:59: kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate, nāpyaniruddhādbījāt /
S06bsu023_u:60: api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura utpadyate, tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
S06bsu023_u:62: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura ityato na saṃkrāntitaḥ //
S06bsu023_u:63: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ bījamupyate(vyāptitvāt - avyā)
S06bsu023_u:66: yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati, ityataḥ tatsadṛśānubandhataśceti /
S06bsu023_u:72: evaṃ yāvadyadi jātirnābhaviṣyat(skandhānāṃ pañcānāṃ prādurbhāvo jātiriti)
S06bsu023_u:76: punaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmapyevaṃ na bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvartitā iti /
S06bsu023_u:77: evaṃ yāvajjāteḥ(skandhaprādurbhāvasya) naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:78: jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jātyābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:79: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttiebhavati prādurbhāva eva,
S06bsu023_u:80: evaṃ yāvat jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:83: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:87: yaḥ punaḥ kāyasya parigrahakṛtvaṃ(svīkārasaṃcayakṛtyaṃ) karoti, ayamucyate abdhātuḥ //
S06bsu023_u:88: yaśca punaḥ kāyasya aśitaṃ pītaṃ bhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ //
S06bsu023_u:98: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinatvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:99: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 111) abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:100: tejodhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya aśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:104: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayaviśeṣairjanita iti //
S06bsu023_u:107: na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na puruṣo na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca mama,
S06bsu023_u:111: yā eṣveva ṣaḍdhātuṣu ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā,
S06bsu023_u:115: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī ucyante saṃskārā iti //
S06bsu023_u:134: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā aniñjyopagāśceti saṃbhāvyante avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
S06bsu023_u:137: bhavati, aniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmaniñjyo pagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:142: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyasamūhāḥ pravartante, ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ucyate //
S06bsu023_u:143: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate, iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā ucyate //
S06bsu023_u:149: na me priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairviyogo bhavatu aparityāgaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:152: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena manasā vācā,
S06bsu023_u:154: yat karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiḥ, sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate //
S06bsu023_u:166: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:167: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:168: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:169: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayai (pratītyotpādai)rjanita iti //
S06bsu023_u:170: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditamavidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati /
S06bsu023_u:172: sa cāsau nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:173: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogāt ṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādātprabuddhaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 113)
S06bsu023_u:177: amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālambanasvabhāveṣu, hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
S06bsu023_u:181: cakṣuśca pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
S06bsu023_u:191: tatrāpi cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya āśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:192: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avalambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:193: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:194: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:195: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:196: cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayasamavāyairjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:197: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:199: tatra pratītyasamutpāde na kaściddharmo asmāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati, (iti śāśvatāntaniṣedhaḥ)
S06bsu023_u:204: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyā āyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:205: asvāmikeṣu adharmeṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu,
S06bsu023_u:208: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 114) tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:216: yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
S06bsu023_u:217: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavantīti na /
S06bsu023_u:220: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu /
S06bsu023_u:227: visadṛśāt sattvanikāyāt visabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantareṣvabhinirvartante, ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ //
S06bsu023_u:233: yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate, atastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti //
S06bsu023_u:234: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta śāradvatīputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatena samyakpraṇītaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitaṃ ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad (vi)
S06bsu023_u:235: parītaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akṛtaṃ asaṃskṛtaṃ apramitaṃ anāvaraḥaṃ śivaṃ abhayaṃ ahāryaṃ avyayaṃ avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S06bsu023_u:236: asatyato 'saktataḥ asārato rogato gaḥḍataḥ śalyato 'nityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu023_u:237: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati - kimahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvamatīte 'dhvani,
S06bsu023_u:239: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyahamanāgate 'dhvani,
S06bsu023_u:242: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nvidam, kathaṃsvididam, ki santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti //
S06bsu023_u:249: tṛṣṇā yāvadbhava iti eṣā aparāntikī apekṣā,
S06bsu023_u:252: " "tasyaivaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 115) bhavati - saṃyogāt saṃskṛtaṃ pravartate, visaṃyogānna pravartate /
S06bsu023_u:253: sāmagryā saṃskṛtaṃ pravartate, visāmagryā na pravartate /
S06bsu023_u:255: vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāśca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:256: na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarva - saṃskārāṇāmadhigamiṣyāmaḥ sattvaparipācanatāyai" iti //
S06bsu023_u:259: tadāha - rūpaṃ tu dvividham, - varṇataḥ saṃsthānataḥ /
S06bsu023_u:260: te ca viṃśatidhā, tatra nīlādi nava, dīrghādyekādaśa /
S06bsu023_u:261: etatsarvaṃ rūpaṃ pāramārthikaṃ nāstīti pratijñā, svarūpeṇa hetuḥ /
S06bsu023_u:262: svahetunā tathaiva janito yathāvat paramārthikaṃ tu /
S06bsu023_u:265: "pararūpeṇa rūpaṃ nāsti, svarūpeṇa vā ubhayarūpeṇa vā anubhayarūpeṇa veti" śāstram //
S06bsu023_u:267: "na sat nāsat na sadasat na cāpyanubhayātmakam" / iti śāstram // //
S06bsu023_u:271: "na svati nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:272: utpannā jātu dṛśyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana" //
S06bsu023_u:273: tatra sato vidyamānasyotpādāyogāt vidyamānasyotpāde niravadhijanmaprasaṅgenānavasthā syāt /
S06bsu023_u:278: tacca pararūpaṃ viruddhadharmābhyāsaḥ, sa ca bhedakaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:279: yatra parapratipattistatra kiṃ svarūpapratipattireva nāsti? pratītirasti, na svarūpapratipattiḥ /
S06bsu023_u:280: iyameva pratītiriti cet, tarhi apratītireva pratītiḥ /
S06bsu023_u:282: ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatīti cet, miśrapratītirapi nāsti /
S06bsu023_u:283: tasmāt ghaṭo bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ, ataḥ siddhāḥ dvirūpatā /
S06bsu023_u:286: yadi vyavahartavyaikaśarīratāṃ tyaktvā prasahya rūpasyābhāvasya kiṃcidrūpaṃ syāt,
S06bsu023_u:293: parāpekṣāyāṃ so 'pi anityaḥ, anityaṃ prati vikalpe sarvaṃ pūrvadāpadyate //
S06bsu023_u:294: ataḥ svasmāt svayamutpadyate, anyasmādvā? nādyaḥ, prāganutpannaḥ svayamutpadyate /
S06bsu023_u:296: anutpannena rūpeṇa anutpanna evotpannaḥ, anutpādena rūpeṇotpādāyogāt /
S06bsu023_u:297: atha prāgabhāvaḥ anutpannaśabdavācyaḥ, tat kiṃ prāgabhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇotpadyate?
S06bsu023_u:298: yadyevam, tadā abhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ, paścādbhāva iti cet, tatra kimabhāva eva bhāvo bhavati?
S06bsu023_u:299: evaṃ sati abhāvasya punaḥpunarutpāde na prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:300: anavadhirutpādaśceti pararūpeṇotpāde ca apūrvakotpāda evāṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt /
S06bsu023_u:301: na caivaṃ siddhāntaḥ, utpannena utpāde vā saṃsāreṣu utpādaviramābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ prayojanābhāvaśca /
S06bsu023_u:303: atha vā - svayameva anyarūpeṇa utpadyate, svātmani kāritravirodhaḥ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
S06bsu023_u:304: na parata utpādaḥ, kutastatra siddhasya vā asiddhasya vā?
S06bsu023_u:305: uktamatrottaram - siddhasya utpādena kim, asiddhasya utpāda eva nāsti /
S06bsu023_u:307: nte, dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na bhavati iti nyāyāt //
S06bsu023_u:310: tadyathā - yat svatantraṃ na tat kādācitkam, yathā anyā sāmagrī /
S06bsu023_u:313: yat kādācitkaṃ tatparatantram, yathā kuśūlatalanimīlitaṃ bījamaṅkurajananaṃ prati /
S06bsu023_u:316: yat paratantraṃ tatpratītyasamutpannam, yathā tadeva vījam /
S06bsu023_u:326: iti vacanaṃ dhāryaṃ manasikāryaṃ sarvathā sarvadā sarvadarśibhiḥ //
